title: Budget balance in Greece 2024
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Budget balance in billion euros, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2024 to 2019.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is moderately negative which exists from 2019 to 2017.
But, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2016 to 2014.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2016.
gold: The statistic shows the budget balance in Greece from 2014 to 2018 , with projections until 2024 . A positive value indicates a state surplus ; a negative value , a budget deficit . In 2018 , the budget surplus of Greece was around 1.77 billion euros .
